main event: A bright white ball or fire with a tail was observed moving at high speed from Southwest to East-Northeast in Clemson, South Carolina on November 25, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as a ball of fire that would have radiated high intensity of light if seen at night,The object moved at a high speed and dipped above the horizon,The sighting occurred during the day at approximately 48 degrees above the horizon,The report lacks specific data about the exact position of the observer and other identifying information,The reliability of the report is unknown and no photographs were included.
sighted object: bright white ball or fire with a tail
